name: Alduin
description: The World-Eater, the ancient dragon who destroyed the world in the Dragon War and was later resurrected by Daedric forces. Alduin is the most powerful of all dragons and the main antagonist of the main quest.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23660000%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüêâ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Dragon Priest
description: Ancient Nordic priests who served the Dragons during their rule. These powerful undead mages wield devastating magic and wear legendary masks that grant unique powers.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23552200%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüëπ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Ancient Dragon
description: One of the oldest and most powerful dragons still living in Skyrim. Ancient dragons are significantly more dangerous than their younger kin, with powerful magic and devastating breath attacks.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23333333%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüêâ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Vampire Lord
description: A powerful vampire in their lord form with shapeshifting abilities, increased durability, and devastating melee and magic attacks. Vampire Lords are feared predators of the night.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23330000%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eü¶á%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Werewolf
description: A fearsome beast-form transformation that grants incredible strength and speed. Werewolves are relentless hunters with devastating melee attacks and regenerative abilities.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23222222%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüê∫%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Deathlord
description: The most powerful form of draugr, these ancient Nordic warriors have risen from their slumber. They command powerful Thu'um and wield enchanted weapons.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23444444%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüíÄ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Daedric Dremora
description: A fearsome Dremora warrior summoned from the planes of Oblivion. These demonic beings are equipped with daedric weaponry and radiate magical power.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23662200%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüëø%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Giant
description: Massive humanoid creatures that herd mammoths across Skyrim's tundra. Giants are peaceful unless provoked, but their club attacks can send enemies flying through the air.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23886644%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüóø%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Hagraven
description: Twisted witches transformed into bird-like creatures through dark magic. Hagravens are powerful spellcasters who lead Forsworn tribes and practice ancient magic.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23663399%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eü¶Ö%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Frost Troll
description: Large, aggressive creatures with powerful regeneration abilities. Frost trolls are covered in icy fur and resist frost damage, making them formidable opponents in cold regions.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2399ccff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüëπ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Falmer Shadowmaster
description: The blind, twisted descendants of the Snow Elves who were enslaved by the Dwemer. Shadowmasters are elite Falmer warriors who have mastered the art of fighting without sight.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23555577%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüëΩ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Chaurus Reaper
description: Large insectoid creatures bred by the Falmer. Reapers are the most dangerous variant, with deadly poison attacks and armored exoskeletons.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23336633%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eü¶Ç%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Frost Atronach
description: An elemental construct of pure frost magic. These creatures are immune to frost attacks and deal devastating cold damage to their enemies.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2300ffff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚ùÑÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Storm Atronach
description: An elemental construct of storm and lightning. These powerful beings are immune to shock attacks and can unleash devastating lightning upon their foes.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23ffff00%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚ö°%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Fire Atronach
description: An elemental creature made of pure flame. Fire Atronachs are completely immune to fire damage and attack with burning projectiles.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23ff4400%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüî•%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Spriggan
description: Ancient nature spirits that guard the forests of Skyrim. Spriggans can command animals and regenerate health rapidly when near plants.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2344aa44%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüå≥%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Ice Wraith
description: Ethereal serpentine creatures made of ice and wind. Ice wraiths are difficult to hit and deal frost damage with their attacks.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23aaeeff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüåÄ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Sabre Cat
description: A large predatory feline with prominent saber-like teeth. These aggressive hunters are found throughout Skyrim and pose a significant threat to unprepared adventurers.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cc8822%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüêØ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Frostbite Spider
description: A giant ice-infused spider found in the depths of Blackreach. Highly venomous and capable of firing freezing venom projectiles.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2300ccff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüï∑Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Daedric Sphere
description: A mechanical sphere of pure Daedric design. These constructs fire lethal spikes and are surprisingly mobile despite their heavy armor.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23554433%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚öôÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Mammoth
description: Massive woolly beasts herded by giants across Skyrim's tundra. Mammoths are generally peaceful but will defend themselves and their giant herders fiercely.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23665544%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eü¶£%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Wisp Mother
description: Ethereal female spirits that command wisps and drain the life force of their victims. Wisp mothers are highly resistant to physical damage.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23aa99ff%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüëª%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Forsworn Briarheart
description: Elite Forsworn warriors whose hearts have been replaced with briar hearts in a dark ritual. These undead champions are incredibly powerful and command respect within their tribes.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23884422%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüó°Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Lurker
description: Grotesque creatures that serve Hermaeus Mora. These tentacled monstrosities emerge from pools of ink in Apocrypha to defend the Daedric Prince's realm.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23003322%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüêô%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Seeker
description: Cloaked servants of Hermaeus Mora with numerous writhing tentacles. Seekers guard the forbidden knowledge within Apocrypha and attack intruders with magical energy.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23446655%22 width=%22200%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2230%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüëÅÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
